entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -21.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 11:43 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -21.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -23.5°C
Wind: NNW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
